Text: After having downloaded this album I can certainly understand why its hard to find:  lame singer (Lisa Stanfield?) and just lame music! It felt as though my energy got drained listening to this! How ever thats of course just MY personal experience, I am open to the fact that there might be some few humans who might find this mistreatening of ears and music actually nice and stimulating =)  ! Thanks for the torrent anyway, dude!
Guess the singer would be "Lisa Lisa" in "Lisa Lisa & The Cult Jam" who had some big hits in USA in the mid 80Â´s. I would be thrilled to find some Greatest Hits-album on Pirate Bay !!!
